titles.title: Federal Aviation Research and Development Reauthorization Act of 2011
To reauthorize the civil aviation research and development projects and activities of the Federal Aviation Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 17 - 13.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology. H. Rept. 112-52.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 26.
